exam.question: —I can hardly believe my eyes. Is that you, Lucy?—Yes. It has been almost 20 years ______ we were together.

answer.explain:
译文： —我几乎不敢相信我的眼睛。是你吗， 露西？
—是我。从我们在一起到现在已经过去近20年了。 本题考查连词的词义辨析。since表示“自从”， 从句用一般过去时， 主句用现在完成时， before是“…之前”， after是“…之后”， until表示“直到…时”。根据句意， 此处表示的是“从我们在一起到现在已经过去近20年了”， 因此选A。

synos.tran: 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后

phrases.pCn: 自什么时候起，打什么时候开始

trans.tranCn: 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后

trans.tranOther: from a particular time or event in the past until the present, or in that period of time
When you are talking about an event or situation in the past, you use since to indicate that another event happened at some point later in time
